text: What is the most efficient Java Collections library?
What is the most efficient Java Collections library?
A few years ago, I did a lot of Java and had the impression back then that trove is the best (most efficient) Java Collections implementation.
But when I read the answers to the question "Most useful free Java libraries?
" I noticed that trove is hardly mentioned.
So which Java Collections library is best now?
UPDATE: To clarify, I mostly want to know what library to use when I have to store millions of entries in a hash table etc.
(need a small runtime and memory footprint).
